about_the_game:
Do you want to complete "Yes, Brother" getting all short paths and unlocking all scenes as well as to create your wallpapers with "Yes, Brother's" images in HD resolution?



This DLC contains a guide with all detailed information you need to complete the whole game. Also, it contains all adult scenes of "Yes, Brother" WITHOUT backgrounds, size 1920x1080. In other words, by buying this DLC, you'll get:

  • A Walkthrough Document;
  • 5 Adult Scenes (22 images);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Yes Brother\Adult Art Pack + Guide

content_descriptors.notes: Yes, Brother Adult Art Pack + Guide contains partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
